ModMetaData.name: RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.9[/h1]
This mod changes [b]Vanilla[/b] and [b]Modded[/b] trait colors according to their commonality using the RimTraits coloring scheme.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]Vanilla trait coloring [*]Modded trait coloring (4 mods) [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2836791007]RimFantasy - Medieval Overhaul Edition[/url] [b]- Recommended for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2553700067]Medieval Overhaul[/url] users. Incompatible with the other RimFantasy mods.[/b]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630669656]RimFantasy - Gemstones[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630670287]RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2632845986]RimFantasy - Crystallic Lighting[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2634323159]RimFantasy - Arcane Batons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2656314145]RimFantasy - Arcane Defences[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2651522590]RimFantasy - Arcane Weapons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2655568216]RimFantasy Addon - Heroic Weapons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talents[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1508292711][KV] More Trait Slots - 1.2[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1508850027]RimHUD[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1855885448]Guard For Me[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url] [/list]
[b]Mod Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*][Minor Conflict] Conflicts with mods that changes trait color based on commonality. [*][Mod Support] Built-in support for RimTraits - General Traits. [*][Mod Support] Built-in support for Vanilla Fishing Expanded. [*][Mod Support] Built-in support for Vanilla Traits Expanded. [*][Mod Support] Built-in support for Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional). [/list]
[h1][url=https://discord.gg/rimworld]Click here to join us on the Community Discord![/url][/h1] [url=https://ko-fi.com/sierra0001][img]https://i.imgur.com/SBiUpbW.png[/img][/url]
[b]Balance:[/b] Balance is not particularly relevant in this mod, as commonality is unaltered or dependent on mod usage.
[h1]Credits:[/h1] [list] [*]Ogliss for helping me figure out how patching works. [*]Gouda quiche for helping me figure out how patching works. [*]Mascot inspired and based on Geneforge by Spiderweb Software (Go play the series, it's great). [/list]
